text:
@realDonaldTrump @nytimes @SecAzar March 8th said, 

“We have a perfectly coordinated and fine tuned plan at the White House for our attack on Coronavirus!”

March 9th said

“This blindsided the world!”

LIES! You had NO plan of period! 

You were blindsided because up until that point you did absolutely NOTHING!
